name: Hoisting & Variable Scope
description: This topic covers how JavaScript handles variable declaration and initialization during the creation and execution phases. It explains the behavior of var, let, and const, hoisting mechanics, the Temporal Dead Zone (TDZ), and how scope affects variable access inside functions and blocks. Ideal for mastering tricky runtime behavior and debugging common reference errors.
